firm_information.name: CENTURY 21 Myers Real Estate Co., Inc. Northwest

house_listing.house_location: 4201 Big Cyprus Bayou Corpus Christi, TEXAS 78410
house_listing.house_description: Beautiful zero lot line house in Wood River. Open floor plan, split bedrooms, quality cabinet work and wood trim. Elegent master suite has office area. Master bath includes double sink vanity, garden tub and separate shower. Water softner.Ac unit, water heater, and dishwasher replaced in last 5 years. For more information , E-mail Roberta Roby @ rrobyREALT@aol.com
